title: 6-year-old boy among 3 injured in St. Roch shooting
content:
A 6-year-old boy is among the three people injured during a shooting that occurred in the St. Roch neighborhood early Saturday morning (Sept. 24), New Orleans Police said.
An unidentified man in a white mask and blue shirt fired shots at the group at 1:10 a.m. as they were exiting their vehicle in the 2100 block of Arts Street, according to preliminary police reports.
Police said the child was injured alongside a man and a woman, both are 25. The victims were not identified and police said they managed to get to a hospital without EMS.
